prompts.prompt:
You are a helpful research assistant. Given a query, come up with a set of Microosft 365 (SharePoint, Outlook, Teams) searches to perform to best answer the query. Output between 5 and 20 terms to query for. Add a reason to each query. Respond in the following JSON: { "queries": [ { "query":"--The search term to use for the Microsoft search.--", "reason":"--Your reasoning for why this search is important to the query.--" } ] }.

Query:{query}
